#include <stdio.h>

#include <stdlib.h>

#include <string.h>

typedef struct _node

{

char name[64];

char id[10];

char score[64];

struct _node *next;

} Node;

typedef struct _list

{

Node *head;

} List;

//--1--æ’å…¥æ–°çš„å­¦ç”Ÿ(å¤´æ’æ³•)

void AddStudentByHead(List *list);

//å°¾æ’æ³•V1

void AddStudentByEndV1(List *list);

//å°¾æ’æ³•V2åªèƒ½å•ç‹¬ä½¿ç”¨

void AddStudentByEndV2(List *list);

void ChangeStudent(List *list, char *input);

void Input(Node *p);

int Search(List *list, char *input);

void Delete(List *list, char *input);

void PrintStudent(List *list);

void ClearList(List *list);

Node *PrintFlage(List *list, char *input);

int main(void)

{

List list;

list.head = NULL;

char code;

int c;

char input1[64];

char input2[64];

char input3[64];

int flag = 0;

Node *temp;

while (1)

{

â€‹
â€‹ printf("\n

3 ä¿®æ”¹å­¦ç”Ÿä¿¡æ¯\n
5 æ˜¾ç¤ºæ‰€æœ‰å­¦ç”Ÿä¿¡æ¯\n
6 é€€å‡ºç³»ç»Ÿ\n
==========================================\n
è¯´æ˜ï¼šé€šè¿‡æ•°å­—é€‰æ‹©èœå•\n
â•šâ€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â•\n");

â€‹ printf("è¯·è¾“å…¥æŒ‡ä»¤ä»£ç (1-6)\n");

â€‹ do

â€‹ {

â€‹ scanf("%c", &code);

â€‹ } while (code>54||code<49);

â€‹

â€‹ switch (code)

â€‹ {

â€‹ case '1':

â€‹ printf("è¯·é€‰æ‹©æ’å…¥å­¦ç”Ÿçš„æ–¹æ³•(1-å¤´æ’æ³• 2-å°¾æ’æ³•V1)ğŸ˜Š;

â€‹ scanf("%d", &c);

â€‹ switch (c)

â€‹ {

â€‹ case 1:

â€‹ AddStudentByHead(&list);

â€‹ break;

â€‹ case 2:

â€‹ AddStudentByEndV1(&list);

â€‹ break;

â€‹ default:

â€‹ printf("è¾“å…¥æŒ‡ä»¤é”™è¯¯\n");

â€‹ }

â€‹ break;

â€‹ case '2':

â€‹ printf("è¯·è¾“å…¥ä½ è¦æŸ¥æ‰¾çš„å­¦ç”Ÿ:");

â€‹ scanf("%s", input1);

â€‹ flag = (Search(&list, input1));

â€‹ if (flag > 0)

â€‹ {

â€‹ temp = PrintFlage(&list, input1);

â€‹ printf("å­¦ç”Ÿå§“å:%s\tå­¦å·%s\tåˆ†æ•°:%s\t", temp->name, temp->id, temp->score);

â€‹ }

â€‹ else

â€‹ {

â€‹ printf("ä¸å¥½æ„æ€,æŸ¥æ— æ­¤äºº\n");

â€‹ }

â€‹ break;

â€‹ case '3':

â€‹ printf("è¯·è¾“å…¥ä½ è¦æ›´æ”¹çš„å­¦ç”Ÿåå­—:");

â€‹ scanf("%s", input2);

â€‹ flag = Search(&list, input2);

â€‹ temp = PrintFlage(&list, input2);

â€‹ if (flag > 0)

â€‹ {

â€‹ printf("å½“å‰çš„å­¦ç”Ÿä¿¡æ¯ä¸º:\n");

â€‹ printf("å­¦ç”Ÿå§“å:%s\tå­¦å·%s\tåˆ†æ•°:%s\t", temp->name, temp->id, temp->score);

â€‹ printf("è¯·è¾“å…¥æ‚¨è¦æ›´æ”¹çš„å­¦ç”Ÿä¿¡æ¯\n");

â€‹ ChangeStudent(&list, input2);

â€‹ }

â€‹ else

â€‹ {

â€‹ printf("ä¸å¥½æ„æ€,ä½ è¦æ›´æ”¹çš„å­¦ç”Ÿåå­—å°šæœªå­˜åœ¨\n");

â€‹ }

â€‹ break;

â€‹ case '4':

â€‹ printf("è¯·è¾“å…¥ä½ è¦åˆ é™¤çš„å­¦ç”Ÿåå­—:");

â€‹ scanf("%s", input3);

â€‹ if (Search(&list, input3) > 0)

â€‹ {

â€‹ Delete(&list, input3);

â€‹ }

â€‹ else

â€‹ {

â€‹ printf("ä¸å¥½æ„æ€,ä½ è¦åˆ é™¤çš„å­¦ç”Ÿåå­—å°šæœªå­˜åœ¨\n");

â€‹ }

â€‹ break;

â€‹ case '5':

â€‹ PrintStudent(&list);

â€‹ break;

â€‹ case '6':

â€‹ if (!list.head)

â€‹ {

â€‹ printf("è¿˜æ²¡æœ‰ä¿¡æ¯å‘¢\n");

â€‹ }

â€‹ goto END;

â€‹ default:

â€‹ printf("è¾“å…¥æŒ‡ä»¤é”™è¯¯\n");

â€‹ break;

â€‹ }

â€‹ printf("__\n");

â€‹ printf("\n\n");

}

END:

ClearList(&list), printf("åˆ åº“è·‘è·¯æˆåŠŸ__\n");

system("pause");

return 0;

}

//--1--æ’å…¥æ–°çš„å­¦ç”Ÿ

void AddStudentByHead(List *list)

{

Node *p, *temp;

p = (Node *)malloc(sizeof(Node));

Input(p);

if (list->head)

{

â€‹ temp = list->head;

â€‹ list->head = p;

â€‹ p->next = temp;

}

else

{

â€‹ list->head = p;

â€‹ p->next = NULL;

}

}

//å°¾æ’æ³•

void AddStudentByEndV1(List *list)

{

Node *p;

p = (Node *)malloc(sizeof(Node ));

Input(p);

Node *last;

last = list->head;

if (last)

{

â€‹ while (last->next)

â€‹ {

â€‹ last = last->next;

â€‹ }

â€‹ last->next = p;

â€‹ p->next=NULL;

}

else

{

â€‹ list->head = p;

â€‹ p->next = NULL;

}

}

//å°¾æ’æ³•

/*

void AddStudentByEndV2(List *list)

{

Node *p;

p = (Node *)malloc(sizeof(Node ));

Input(p);

static Node *tail;

if (list->head)

{

â€‹ tail=list->head;

â€‹ tail->next = p;

â€‹ p->next = NULL;

}

else

{

â€‹ list->head = p;

â€‹ p->next = NULL;

}

tail = p;

}

*/

void ChangeStudent(List *list, char *input)

{

Node *p;

for (p = list->head; p; p = p->next)

{

â€‹ if (!strcmp(p->name, input))

â€‹ {

â€‹ Input(p);

â€‹ break;

â€‹ }

}

}

void Input(Node *p)

{

printf("è¯·è¾“å…¥å§“å:");

scanf("%s", p->name);

printf("è¯·è¾“å…¥å­¦å·(2ä½æ•°å­—)ğŸ˜Š;

scanf("%s", p->id);

printf("è¯·è¾“å…¥å­¦ç”Ÿåˆ†æ•°(å°äº1000)ğŸ˜Š;

scanf("%s", p->score);

}

int Search(List *list, char *input)

{

int flag = -1; //æ ‡å¿—

Node *p;

for (p = list->head; p; p = p->next)

{

â€‹ if (!strcmp(p->name, input))

â€‹ {

â€‹ flag = 1;

â€‹ break;

â€‹ }

}

return flag;

}

Node *PrintFlage(List *list, char *input)

{

Node *p;

for (p = list->head; p; p = p->next)

{

â€‹ if (!strcmp(p->name, input))

â€‹ {

â€‹ break;

â€‹ }

}

return p;

}

void Delete(List *list, char *input)

{

Node *p, *q = NULL;

for (p = list->head; p; q = p, p = p->next)

{

â€‹ if (!strcmp(p->name,input))

â€‹ {

â€‹ if (q)

â€‹ {

â€‹ q->next = p->next;

â€‹

â€‹ }

â€‹ else

â€‹ {

â€‹ list->head = p->next;

â€‹ }

â€‹ free(p);

â€‹ break;

â€‹ }

â€‹

}

}

void PrintStudent(List *list)

{

Node *p;

for (p = list->head; p; p = p->next)

{

â€‹ printf("å­¦ç”Ÿå§“å:%s\tå­¦å·:%s\tåˆ†æ•°:%s\t\n", p->name, p->id, p->score);

}

}

//--6--åˆ åº“è·‘è·¯

void ClearList(List *list)

{

Node *p, *q;

for (p = list->head; p; p = q)

{

â€‹ q = p->next;

â€‹ free(p);

}

}

entry.content:
ç»™å®šä¸€ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦ä¸²ï¼Œç¼–å†™ä¸€ä¸ªå‡½æ•°åˆ¤å®šå…¶æ˜¯å¦ä¸ºæŸä¸ªå›æ–‡ä¸²çš„æ’åˆ—ä¹‹ä¸€ã€‚

ç¤ºä¾‹ 1ï¼š

è¾“å…¥ï¼š"tactcoa"
è¾“å‡ºï¼šTrue
è§£é‡Šï¼šæ’åˆ—æœ‰ "tacocat"ã€"atcocta"ï¼Œç­‰ç­‰

ç¤ºä¾‹ 2ï¼š

è¾“å…¥ï¼š"abcda"
è¾“å‡ºï¼šFalse

æˆ‘çš„æ€è·¯:

å¦‚æœè¾“å…¥çš„å­—ç¬¦ä¸²é•¿åº¦æ˜¯å¶æ•°å€,æ‰€ä»¥æ¯ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦çš„æ¬¡æ•°éƒ½æ˜¯å¶æ•°å€

å¦‚æœè¾“å…¥çš„å­—ç¬¦ä¸²é•¿åº¦æ˜¯å¥‡æ•°å€,æœ€å¤šåªèƒ½æœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦çš„æ¬¡æ•°æ˜¯å¥‡æ•°å€

def f(n):
    if len(n)%2==0:
        flag = 1
        d={}
        for i in n:
            d[i] = d.get(i,0)+1
        for j in d.values():
            if j%2==0:
                continue
            else:
                flag = 0
        if flag:
            return 1
        else:
            return 0
    else:
        flag = 0
        d={}
        for j in n:
            d[j] = d.get(j,0)+1
        for i in d.values():
            if i/2==0:
                flag=0
                continue
            if i%2==1:
                flag+=1
        if flag<=1:
            return 1
        else:
            return 0
                
            
        
a = input()

if f(a):
    print("True")
else:
    print("False")
æœ€åä¸€æ¬¡

è¾“å…¥æ ¼å¼ï¼š

æ¯ä¸ªè¾“å…¥åŒ…å« 1 ä¸ªæµ‹è¯•ç”¨ä¾‹ï¼Œå³ä¸€ä¸ªä¸è¶…è¿‡ 1000 ä½çš„æ­£æ•´æ•° Nã€‚

è¾“å‡ºæ ¼å¼ï¼š

å¯¹ N ä¸­æ¯ä¸€ç§ä¸åŒçš„ä¸ªä½æ•°å­—ï¼Œä»¥ D:M çš„æ ¼å¼åœ¨ä¸€è¡Œä¸­è¾“å‡ºè¯¥ä½æ•°å­— D åŠå…¶åœ¨ N ä¸­å‡ºç°çš„æ¬¡æ•° Mã€‚è¦æ±‚æŒ‰ D çš„å‡åºè¾“å‡ºã€‚

æˆ‘çš„ç¬¨åŠæ³•:

#include <stdio.h>

#include <stdlib.h>



int main(void)

{

â€‹    

â€‹    int a[10]={0};



â€‹    char ch[1000];

â€‹    scanf("%s",ch);



â€‹    for(int i=0;ch[i]!='\0';i++)

â€‹    {

â€‹        switch(ch[i])

â€‹        {

â€‹            case '0':a[0]++;break;

â€‹            case '1':a[1]++;break;

â€‹            case '2':a[2]++;break;

â€‹            case '3':a[3]++;break;

â€‹            case '4':a[4]++;break;

â€‹            case '5':a[5]++;break;

â€‹            case '6':a[6]++;break;

â€‹            case '7':a[7]++;break;

â€‹            case '8':a[8]++;break;

â€‹            case '9':a[9]++;break;



â€‹        }

â€‹        

â€‹    }

â€‹    for(int i=0;i<10;i++)

â€‹    {

â€‹        if(a[i]!=0)

â€‹        {

â€‹            printf("%d:%d\n",i,a[i]);

â€‹        }

â€‹        

â€‹    }





â€‹    system("pause");

â€‹    return 0;

}
